properties.name: description
properties.description: The detailed human-readable description of the instruction.

properties.name: bindings
properties.description: The input bindings of the instruction.

properties.name: flow
properties.description: The rule conditions and actions flow.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The detailed human-readable description of the template.

properties.name: flow
properties.description: The template conditions and actions flow.

properties.name: modifiable
properties.description: Defines if the template can be updated or removed.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The detailed human-readable description of the rule.

properties.name: flow
properties.description: The rule conditions and actions flow.

properties.name: modifiable
properties.description: Defines if the rule can be updated or removed.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The current status of the rule.

operations.name: getRule
operations.description: Returns the rule identified by specified UID.

operations.name: getRules
operations.description: Returns the rules matching the filter.

params.name: filter
params.description: Optional LDAP filter defined by 'rule.uid', 'rule.name' and 'rule.tags' keys. If it's missed, all rules are returned.

params.name: rule
params.description: The creation data of the rule to be added.

operations.name: addRuleFromTemplate
operations.description: Adds a new rule from an existing template.

params.name: variables
params.description: JSON representation of the template variables values.

params.name: rule
params.description: The data of the rule to be updated.

operations.name: removeRule
operations.description: Removes the rule identified by specified UID.

operations.name: enableRule
operations.description: Enables the rule identified by specified UID.

operations.name: disableRule
operations.description: Disables the rule identified by specified UID.

operations.name: runRule
operations.description: Executes the actions and checks the conditions of a rule identified by specified UID.

operations.name: getTemplate
operations.description: Returns the template identified by specified UID.

operations.name: getTemplates
operations.description: Returns the templates matching the filter.

params.name: filter
params.description: Optional LDAP filter defined by 'template.uid', 'template.name' and 'template.tags' keys. If it's missed, all templates are returned.

operations.name: removeTemplate
operations.description: Removes a template identified by specified UID.

operations.name: getHandler
operations.description: Returns a handler identified by specified UID.

operations.name: getHandlers
operations.description: Returns the handlers matching the filter.

params.name: filter
params.description: Optional LDAP filter defined by 'handler.uid', 'handler.type' and 'handler.name', 'handler.tags' keys. If it's missed, all handlers are returned.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The data type of the parameter.

properties.name: classes
properties.description: The class names for the parameter.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Specifies if the parameter value is required or not.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The human-readable name of the parameter.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The human-readable description of the parameter.

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: The regular expression matching the value of the parameter.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The allowed minimal value for the numeric parameter.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The allowed maximal value for the numeric parameter.

properties.name: step
properties.description: The allowed value granularity for the numeric parameter.

properties.name: options
properties.description: The list of allowed values for the value of the parameter.

properties.name: inputs
properties.description: The metadata of the handler inputs.

properties.name: outputs
properties.description: The metadata of the handler outputs.
